## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have run `make format` / `just format` to format the code
- [ ] I have run `make lint` / `just lint` and fixed any warnings

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass (`make test` / `just test`)
- [ ] I have tested on multiple platforms (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have added XML doc comments for public APIs
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR introduces breaking changes
- [ ] I have documented the breaking changes and migration path
